channel.title: Paris 474 | New Combat soon!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i46.tinypic.com/neggw7.png[/img][/center]
[u][b]About[/b][/u]
Welcome to the project, [b]Paris 474[/b]
Many of you may know me from some of the communities I'm in and you may know my other partner who is helping which is vayken and yes it's vayken from vaults remake. I know when you see our slogan "[b]Bringing back the old times you enjoyed[/b]" you always think its going to be a remake and it usually looks terrible or never will be playable. This server will be totally different and will not have the same goals since we are not trying to attempt a "[b]remake[/b]" at all. We just want a type of server where they can enjoy the old days of how runescape was and maybe do some minigames, quests, skills, or even Pking.
Paris 474 is also based off of [b]Hyperion[/b] which was written by [b]Graham[/b]. It is an amazing framework built on the MINA network, with an amazing benchmark and is far out better then some of the winterlove based servers you see today. The server has tons of amazing systems that was also supported in this base but we will not be using any of the systems since we use our own.
Our server is based off of the 474 protocol and always will be and there won't be any type of items like Dragon Claws, Chaotics, and etc...
[b]This Thread will be getting updated very slowly so don't expect this to be full out done :)[/b]
[b]Skills:[/b]
[img]http://puu.sh/1wm7w[/img]Melee
[ul][li][color=green]Melee Following[/li] [li][color=green]Specials[/li] [li][color=green]Formulas[/li] [li][color=green]Barrows Effects[/li] [li][color=green]Barrows Degrading[/li] [li][color=red]Skill cape support[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2ia8vup.gif[/img]Range
[ul][li][color=green]Range Following[/li] [li][color=yellow]Projectile clipping check[/li] [li][color=green]Specials[/li] [li][color=green]Arrow Poison[/li] [li][color=green]All bows work[/li] [li][color=green]Projectiles[/li] [li][color=red]Salamanders[/li] [li][color=red]Chins[/li] [li][color=red]Skill cape support[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bQQmu.gif[/img]Prayer
[ul][li][color=red]Bone Burying[/li] [li][color=red]Bones on Alter[/li] [li][color=green]Prayers working[/li] [li][color=green]Prayer Draining[/li] [li][color=red]Skill cape support[/li][/ul]
[img]http://puu.sh/1wmdu[/img]Magic
[ul][li][color=green]Magic Following[/li] [li][color=yellow]Projectile clipping check[/li] [li][color=red]Teleporting[/li] [li][color=yellow]Modern spells[/li] [li][color=green]Ancient spells[/li] [li][color=yellow]Lunar spells[/li] [li][color=red]Skill cape support[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/15x82o.gif[/img]Cooking
[ul][li][color=green]Basic Fish cooking[/li] [li][color=red]Cake making[/li] [li][color=green]Pie making[/li] [li][color=green]Potato making[/li] [li][color=green]Soup making[/li] [li][color=green]Pizza making[/li] [li][color=red]Skill cape support[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img]Woodcutting
[ul][li][color=red]LumberJack[/li] [li][color=green]Better Axes make easier woodcutting[/li] [li][color=red]Bird nests[/li] [li][color=green]Able to cut all tree's[/li] [li][color=red]Skill cape support[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/I4pJ6.gif[/img]Fletching
[ul][li][color=green]Bow Making[/li] [li][color=green]Making Basic Arrows[/li] [li][color=green]Bow Strining[/li] [li][color=green]Bolt Making/Bolt tip/Mithril Grapple Hook[/li] [li][color=green]Crossbow Making[/li] [li][color=green]Making Special kind of arrows like Brutal/Ogre[/li] [li][color=green]Dart Making[/li] [li][color=red]Skill cape support[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img]Fishing
[ul][li][color=red]Barbarian Fishing[/li] [li][color=red]Tool requirements[/li] [li][color=red]Fishing spot's move[/li] [li][color=red]Able to catch all fish[/li] [li][color=red]Skill cape support[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/30neqyp.gif[/img]Firemaking
[ul][li][color=green]Log burning[/li] [li][color=green]Color logs[/li] [li][color=red]Lantern support[/li] [li][color=green]Pyre log support[/li] [li][color=red]Skill cape support[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img]Crafting
[ul][li][color=green]Weaving[/li] [li][color=green]All Types of Armour making[/li] [li][color=green]Spinning[/li] [li][color=green]Pottery Making[/li] [li][color=green]Glass Making[/li] [li][color=green]Jewellery crafting[/li] [li][color=green]BattleStaves Making[/li] [li][color=red]Skill cape support[/li][/ul]

This server is still going very strong its just that vayken wanted to make a new cb system so much more can get added in so updates will be slow but atm

Currently what is done for combat:

Degrading system
Projectile System
new way of handling level req.
Bonuses
Ammo properties and etc…
Weapon interfaces
